name: DigiMeld
overview:
DigiMeld provides a cost-effective and highly-scalable video streaming solution, which can be readily integrated with content delivery networks.

DigiMeld’s advanced Internet video publishing solution and delivery platform is based on a unique Grid-streaming architecture that is capable of both live and on-demand streaming for online video publishers, content delivery networks and enterprises.

DigiMeld’s architecture is designed to scale to millions of simultaneous viewers while dynamically allocating network resources to minimize bandwidth costs. Without compromising the quality of video streaming and viewer experience, DigiMeld’s Grid-streaming architecture improves the overall traffic load balance of the broadcast network while reducing bandwidth costs.

Designed to reliably deliver television quality and high-definition streaming video at a fraction of traditional unicast and CDN economics, DigiMeld’s video publishing solution and delivery platform delivers highly accurate, real-time viewer analytics and reporting to drive increased CPMs for your advertising. Our advertising modules support dynamic targeted advertising in various forms ranging from pre-roll, mid-roll, scrolling ads and picture-in-picture. DigiMeld publishing tools are designed to support any kind of business model (ad-supported, subscription and pay-per-view).

funding_rounds.source_description: Video Distributor DigiMeld Secures $2 Million Series A

video_embeds.description: This video was originally published on Beet.TV
